title: Collaborative regulation strategy of donor and acceptor analogues realizes multifunctional semitransparent organic solar cells with excellent comprehensive performance
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,2825-2836
DOI: 10.1039/D3EE04476A, Paper
Xuexiang Huang, Xinyuan Ren, Yujun Cheng, Youhui Zhang, Zhe Sun, Sangjin Yang, Seoyoung Kim, Changduk Yang, Feiyan Wu, Lie Chen
We propose a collaborative regulation strategy of donor and acceptor analogues to develop multi-functional ST-OSCs with highly comprehensive performance.
